definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly

sentences.english: By definition, a conversation is bi-directional communication.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，“对话”就是一个双向的沟通过程。

sentences.english: Development hairbrush is reverse and revolving , is developed more fully , image is more distinct.
sentences.chinese: 显影两支毛刷双向旋转，显影更充分，图像更清新。

sentences.english: METHODS Bi-directional fermentation engineering was applied.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用双向性发酵工程。

sentences.english: The easiest way is to use a two-way transport like HTTP.
sentences.chinese: 最简单的一种就是用类似HTTP的双向传输。

sentences.english: ESMA adopts efficient double way sampling techniques.
sentences.chinese: 该算法采用了更加有效的双向采样策略。

sentences.english: The targets vary from fixed target, running game target to flying target.
sentences.chinese: 双向飞碟或飞靶射击中使用的靶子。

sentences.english: The goals acknowledge the strong two-way link between poverty and health.
sentences.chinese: 这些目标承认贫困与健康之间存在着牢固的双向联系。
出事路段为双向两车道。

sentences.english: Video conferencing involves the linking of remote sites by one-way or two- way television.
sentences.chinese: 电视会议是将远程地点通过单向或双向电视相连接。

sentences.english: The translation activities had great influences on the cultural intercommunion.
sentences.chinese: 这种翻译活动对于中西文化交流的影响是双向的。

sentences.english: The overall Chinese BOPET film industry is growing rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 中国双向拉伸聚酯薄膜行业发展迅速。

sentences.english: The contact and the gas valve are controlled by phototriac and triac.
sentences.chinese: 用光耦和双向晶闸管控制接触器和电磁阀。

sentences.english: Achieving balance in our trade relationships requires a two-way commitment.
sentences.chinese: 取得我们贸易关系中的平衡需要有双向的承诺。

sentences.english: To facilitate the theoretical analysis, "Two-way bridge arm"new concept is presented.
sentences.chinese: 为便于理论分析，提出了“双向桥臂”概念。

sentences.english: Theoretically, the timing scheme of real two-way green wave control may not exist.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上讲，双向完全绿波控制配时方案可能不存在。

to seal/to close/to confine/to seal off/to close down/sealed/confined/closed/unreceptive

the whole front (in a war)/the whole length (of a road or railway line)
